questions.question: Listen to the audio and choose the best description.
options: She's guiding the cart.
She's ready to cross the road.
She's loading a box onto the cart.
She's sweeping the sidewalk.
questions.script:

（B）She's ready to cross the road.

·She's moving the cart.
256

她正在移动手推车。
·She's pushing the cart.

questions.question: Listen to the audio and choose the best description.
options: The people are moving the seats.
They are waiting to board the plane.
Most of them are concentrating on reading.

（B）他们正在等待登机。

他们正在长椅上读书。
·The people are absorbed in reading.
那些人专心致志地读书。
·The people are looking at reading materials.

questions.question: Listen to the audio and choose the best description.
options: The fruit is displayed on the stand.
Some food is being cooked in the kitchen.

（D）桌子上有一个装满水果的篮子。
·Some fruits have been placed in a basket.
一些水果已经被放到篮子里了。
·An assortment of fruit has been put in a basket.
各式各样的水果被放到一个篮子里了。
·Various types of fruits are in a basket.
篮子里有各种水果。

questions.question: Listen to the audio and choose the best description.

257

options: They're playing the same musical instrument.

·They are performing together.

·The musicians are performing indoors.

·They're making music together.

questions.question: Listen to the audio and choose the best description.
options: They have all taken seats outside.
They have assembled together outdoors.

（C）The people are enjoying a game together.
（D）The people are laughing at a joke.

（B）他们已经在室外聚在了一起。

许多人已经在外面坐下了。

注：在Part 1中，每道试题都添加了3种可能的正确表达方式，考生可
以了解对于同样的照片可能出现的不同表达。

Hello, everyone. As CEO of this company, I am happy to make this great
announcement.（80）I have been informed by the sales manager this morning
that the sales division has just reported on its sales figures for the first half of
the year, and they are well beyond expectations.（81）They have also surveyed
customer satisfaction, and, there again, the results are excellent. The combination of
lower costs and higher sales means that we are heading for the highest profit figures
ever. So, what does all this mean? Yes, you guessed it. This means that you guys
are due for a fat bonus at the end of this year.（82）All you have to do is just

continue doing what you have been doing so far.

Good evening, Radio National listeners, and welcome to “Your Live
Concert Hour” with Jill Boothby.（83）Tonight we have something very special
in store for you—a two-part program featuring two of Asia's premier folk music
acts performing live for you in our studio. In the first part of the program we'll
be listening to the Young Asia Ensemble. This is one of Asia's most innovative
groups, with performers from four different Asian countries who blend a
variety of folk styles.（84）In the second half, we'll hear the Japanese ensemble,
Kaito, who specialize in natural acoustic sounds. And don't forget that both of
these groups will be performing this weekend at the World Folk Festival.
（85）

Good evening, ladies and gentlemen, and welcome to the biennial
Shipbuilding Research Convention.（86）I'm very pleased and proud, as the
convener of this convention, to introduce to you one of the world's leading
research scientists in the field of shipbuilding, Professor Nathan Davidson.
（87）Professor Davidson's speech, entitled “Shipbuilding: the next twenty
years”, will form the basis of a book to be published later this year.（88）I'm
sure that you're all aware that whatever Professor Davidson has to say is not only
fascinating and original, but also extremely pertinent. So, please welcome
Professor Davidson.
女士们先生们，晚上好，欢迎参加两年一届的船舶制造研究大会。作为
大会的召集人，我非常高兴和自豪地向大家介绍船舶制造领域的一位世界顶

个二十年”。以此演讲内容为基础的一本著作将在今年晚些时候出版。我肯
定你们都会意识到，戴维森教授演讲的内容不但引人入胜、见解独到，而且
同时也极为切题。因此，请大家欢迎戴维森教授演讲。

It's come to my attention that our latest advertising campaign isn't doing well.
In fact, sales of several of our items declined right after our newest TV
commercials started airing. （95）According to customer feedback, the ads are
extremely unappealing and make people not want to purchase our products. As
such, I'm canceling the ad campaign and firing Walters Media.（96）We need
to start a new media campaign to make up for the damage that has been done at
once. I've decided to use Pembroke Advertising.（97）Janet, I want you to
contact the company at once and request that a representative be sent here. Ideally,
someone should arrive tomorrow morning.
我注意到我们最近的广告宣传活动做得不好。实际上，自从最新的电视
广告片播出之后，我们几种货品的销量都下降了。根据顾客的反馈，我们的
广告非常没有吸引力，看了之后不想购买我们的商品。基于此种情况，我取
消了这次广告宣传活动并与沃尔斯特传媒解约。我们需要立即开展一场新的
